name: Eupatorium aromaticum
Relationship: Lapsana communis-Nipple-wort useful in sore nipples and piles. Hyos.; Passiflora.; Hydr. mur.
details: Nervous erethism; restlessness and morbid watchfulness. Hysteria and chorea. Low fevers, with extreme restlessness. Aphthous disease. SORE NIPPLES. Sore mouth in infants. Vomiting of bile, pain in stomach, headache, and fever.
dosage: Tincture, locally, in sore mouth and sore nipples. Internally, tincture to third attenuation.
